title_narrative: South-South cooperation for the promotion of decent work in cotton-producing countries in Africa and Latin America
transaction_ref: GLO/14/45/BRA-2019-GLO361 - Increased capacity of the member States to ensure respect for, promote and realize fundamental principles and rights at work
GLO/14/45/BRA-2019-GLO361 - Increased capacity of the member States to ensure respect for, promote and realize fundamental principles and rights at work
sector_narrative: ILO Results Framework 2020-2021: Output 7.1. Increased capacity of the member States to ensure respect for, promote and realize fundamental principles and rights at work
description_narrative: In the context of the South-South Brazil-ILO Cooperation Program, this project aims to contribute to the promotion of decent work in cotton-producing developing countries, through the systematization of Brazilian experiences and the sharing and adaptation in interested countries. To this effect, the Government of Brazil and the ILO shall organize prospecting missions, execute and monitor South-South / trilateral technical cooperation activities, which will be implemented as defined in work plans that will be formulated in partnership with the interested countries.
document_link_title_narrative: Development Cooperation Dashboard Project Page: South-South cooperation for the promotion of decent work in cotton-producing countries in Africa and Latin America
contact_info_department_narrative: Departement of Partnerships and Field Support (PARDEV)
